Member Enumeration Documentation

enum GrRenderTargetMgr::EFORMAT

Enumerator:
EF_RGB16 
EF_RGB24  not supported for renderbuffers.
EF_RGBA16  not supported for renderbuffers.
EF_RGBA32  not supported for renderbuffers.
EF_RGB48F 
EF_RGBA64F  not supported for renderbuffers.
EF_RGBA128F  not supported for renderbuffers.
EF_DEPTH  not supported for renderbuffers.
EF_DEPTH16 
EF_DEPTH24 
EF_DEPTHSTENCIL 
EF_DEPTH24STENCIL8  currently not supported by GL drivers.
EF_I8 
EF_COUNT  currently not supported by hardware as a target.
